articles.title: Medical videos on YouTube often provide incomplete information - EurekAlert
articles.description: Implantable cardioverter defibrillator (ICD) information on YouTube is of low and highly-variable quality, according to research presented at the American College of Cardiology (ACC) Quality Summit 2022.
